EmailTemplate.name: Prospect Store Visit Summary
EmailTemplate.subject: A potential new store was prospected on {!Store_Visit__c.Start_Date_Time__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To whom it may concern,
{!Store_Visit__c.Owner_Full_Name__c} just prospected a new dealer location on {!Store_Visit__c.Start_Date_Time__c}.
While prospecting the store, {!Store_Visit__c.Owner_Full_Name__c} recorded the following observations: <StoreActivities>
